citeinfo.title: Spatial catchments data release: A national database for river metabolism (2007-2017)

descript.abstract: Estimates of gross primary productivity, ecosystem respiration, and gas exchange coefficients for 356 streams and rivers across the continental United States. This data set contains the following parameters: site_name, data_source, which are defined below.
descript.purpose: To bring metabolism data to the world!

idinfo.useconst: None, but see Distribution Liability below. Users are advised to read the associated publication thoroughly to understand appropriate use and data limitations.
idinfo.datacred: This work was funded by the USGS Powell Center (Working Group title: "Continental-scale overview of stream primary productivity, its links to water quality, and consequences for aquatic carbon biogeochemistry"). Additional financial support came from the USGS NAWQA program and Office of Water Information. NSF grants DEB-1146283 and EF1442501 partially supported ROH. The USGS Wisconsin Modeling Center provided access to the HTCondor cluster for generating metabolism estimates.
idinfo.native: This dataset was generated using open source tools available in the R programming language (R version 3.4.1 (2017-06-30)). The computing platform for generating data and metadata was x86_64-apple-darwin15.6.0. R packages loaded into this environment: maptools, version: 0.9-2; mda.streams, version: 0.9.24; meddle, version: 0.0.4; maps, version: 3.2.0; dataRetrieval, version: 2.7.3; rgeos, version: 0.3-26; dplyr, version: 0.7.4; sbtools, version: 1.1.6; httr, version: 1.3.1; rgdal, version: 1.2-15; sp, version: 1.2-5; whisker, version: 0.3-2; yaml, version: 2.1.14; xml2, version: 1.1.1; magrittr, version: 1.5.

citeinfo.title: GAGES-II: Geospatial Attributes of Gages for Evaluating Streamflow
Watershed boundaries for study sites of the U.S. Geological Survey Surface Water Trends project
Geospatial database of the study boundary, sampled sites, watersheds, and riparian zones developed for the U.S. Geological Survey Midwest Stream Quality Assessment

attracc.attraccr: No formal attribute accuracy tests were conducted.

horizpa.horizpar: A formal accuracy assessment of the horizontal positional information in the data set has not been conducted.

vertacc.vertaccr: A formal accuracy assessment of the vertical positional information in the data set has either not been conducted, or is not applicable.

procstep.procdesc: Existing polygons were combined from various sources (see attributes and descriptions). Spatial tools in the R programming language were used to perform the operations of merging and modifying attributes.

enttyp.enttypd: Catchment polygons from various sources collated into a single shapefile Catchments approximately represent the contributing area for gaging stations. Not all stations had catchments delineated, so those included here are a subset of the total.

attr.attrdef: The National Water Information System site name for the catchment of reference

attr.attrdefs: shortname reference for dataset provider;see cross-cites for full refernce information

cntaddr.address: Denver Federal Center, Building 810, Mail Stop 302

distinfo.distliab: This information is preliminary or provisional and is subject to revision. It is being provided to meet the need for timely best science. The information has not received final approval by the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) and is provided on the condition that neither the USGS nor the U.S. Government shall be held liable for any damages resulting from the authorized or unauthorized use of the information.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Biological Data Profile of the Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
